pullRequest.title: JIRA: Add support for 'priority' and 'user' fields

commit.message: Feat(Jira): Add support for 'priority' and 'user' fields
Fix(Jira Cloud): Set 'accountId' field when creating an issue with a user

nodes.bodyText: I don't think it's worth doing right now since this works and we will potentially be rewriting a good chunk of issue-tracking functionality in the coming versions.
